Aug. 23, 1980 D Edinburgh International Contest
Edinburgh International Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
edinburgh-international-contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh March contest - 1st Lancashire Constabulary 87, 2nd Whitburn Burgh 86. Hymn tune contest - 1st Bo'ness and Carriden 88, 2nd tie between Lancashire Constabulary 87 and Whitburn 87.
Feb. 6, 2011, 8:31 p.m. June 2, 2014, 1:30 p.m.
1 Bo'ness and Carriden Band David James
2 Whitburn Band Peter Parkes

4 Newhall Band Ernest Woodhouse
